mapper.select: SELECT D.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S_LOCALE) AS RNUM, C.* FROM(SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.S_CODE ORDER BY B.S_PHOTONAME) AS NO, round((( ACOS(SIN(${userLocalX} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * SIN(S_GPS_X * 3.14159265359 / 180) + COS(${userLocalX} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS(S_GPS_X * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS((${userLocalY} - S_GPS_Y)* 3.14159265359 / 180)) * 180 / 3.14159265359) * 60 * 1.1515),3) AS S_LOCALE, A.*,B.S_PHOTOPATH, B.S_PHOTONAME, B.S_PHOTONAME_ORIGIN FROM SHOP_INFO_TBL A, SHOP_PHOTO_TBL B WHERE A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE(+))C WHERE NO < 2 ORDER BY S_LOCALE)D WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (1-1)*10+1 AND 1*10

SELECT D.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S_LOCALE) AS RNUM,C.* FROM (SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.S_CODE ORDER BY B.S_PHOTONAME) AS NO, round((( ACOS(SIN(${userLocalX} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * SIN(S_GPS_X * 3.14159265359 / 180) + COS(${userLocalX} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS(S_GPS_X * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS((${userLocalY} - S_GPS_Y) * 3.14159265359 / 180)) * 180 / 3.14159265359) * 60 * 1.1515),3) AS S_LOCALE, A.* ,B.S_PHOTOPATH, B.S_PHOTONAME, P.P_CAT,P.P_DOG,P.P_SHORT,P.P_LONG,P.P_SMALL,P.P_MEDIUM,P.P_LARGE FROM SHOP_INFO_TBL A INNER JOIN SHOP_PHOTO_TBL B ON A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE INNER JOIN SHOP_PRODUCT_TBL P ON A.S_CODE = P.S_CODE)C WHERE NO < 2 ORDER BY S_LOCALE)D WHERE NO >= 1
AND S_PARKING = 1 AND S_WIFI = 1 AND S_SUBWAY = 1 AND S_CHARGE = 1 AND S_PICKUP = 1 AND S_BIGDOG = 1 AND P_CAT = 1 AND P_DOG = 1 AND P_SHORT = 1 AND P_LONG = 1 AND P_SMALL = 1 AND P_MEDIUM = 1 AND P_LARGE = 1
SELECT A.*, B.P_CAT,B.P_DOG,B.P_SHORT,B.P_LONG,B.P_SMALL,B.P_MEDIUM,B.P_LARGE FROM SHOP_INFO_TBL A INNER JOIN SHOP_PRODUCT_TBL B ON A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE WHERE A.S_CODE = #{sCode}
SELECT * FROM REVIEW_DETAIL_TBL WHERE S_CODE = #{sCode} ORDER BY R_DATE
